name: IT201 Project 1 (CJPobol)
description:
Change Shape

Input: Left click on options in a dropdown

Output: Drawn objects will now be the newly selected shape

Spawn Object

Input: Right click

Output: Spawn object at current mouse position

Delete Object

Input: Left click

Output: Object at current mouse position is deleted

Change Color

Input: Left drag on RGB sliders

Output: Drawn objects will now be the newly selected color

Change Size

Input: Left drag on size slider

Output: Draw objects will now be the selected size

Clear All

Input: Left click on button

Output: deletes all objects on the screen

Display Mouse Position

Input: Mouse Location

Output: Mouse Position text in top right is updated to reflect new position (x, y)
